pages.text: This one is going to be very useful for mobfarms and similar! You can increase the explosion resistance of frame and illusion blocks with flint (finally a good use case) or an Obsidian Compound Chunk. A piece of flint only increases the explosion resistance by a small amount (configurable). One single Obsidian Compound Chunk however reinforces the frame block up to the

pages.title: Hard Rock!
pages.text: maximum explosion resistance (configurable). In either case, the item $(l)$(#f00)will be consumed in the action!$() However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. You cannot increase the explosion resistance of an empty frame.
This feature is supported by all frame and illusion blocks.

Hint: Frame or Illusion blocks with sufficiently large explosion resistance absorb any explosion waves sent in this direction, making them very useful for creeper and ghast farms. Time to make your mob farms fancy! $(l)$(#f00)This does not work for the Wither and the Ender Dragon!$() Both can still destroy these blocks
